transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, good morning sir.
Customer: Morning.
Executive: Juhi baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se, aapne mujhe call kiya tha na abhi?
Customer: Haan madam, haan madam, boliye.
Executive: Mail aapka mil gaya hai mujhe.
Customer: Haan madam.
Executive: Haan. Main na ek baar mere manager se aapki baat aur kara deti hu, call pe please.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Kab karenge madam?
Executive: Ek minute sir aap call kariye ga.
Customer: Okay, okay, theek hai.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Sir, good afternoon sir, boliye sir, okay sir.
Executive: How are you?
Customer: Fine sir.
Executive: Okay. Yeah, actually Power Tech, right?
Customer: Haan, Power Tech sir.
Executive: Yeah, it's very evening I was also trying to connect but your number was not taking this morning. So, she said regarding the refund request.
Customer: Haan sir, main Hindi mein baat karta hu, haan sir boliye. Hindi mein kar sakte hai sir. So actually kal maine bhi try hi kiya tha but aapka number not responding ja raha tha. Actually Juhi ji mere paas aaye hai ki you are refund ke liye matlab aap request dalna chah rahe hai, right sir?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: So, jaana chahte hai sir kya hua abhi matlab one month ki hai.
Customer: Sir, woh mera relate mera related nahi hai woh leads aa raha hai mere ko, uska wohi problem hai sir.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Mera lead nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Solar panel, meter panels vagaira mein deal karte hai, right sir?
Customer: Haan madam, haan sir.
Executive: Okay. So, ab main jaana chahta hu sir basically jaise aap log deal kar rahe hai toh apna local area mein deal karte hai ya panel India mein deal kar sakte hai sir?
Customer: Sir, woh India mein karta hu main sir yeh Andhra, Telangana, yeh pura karta hu, haan sir madam, haan sir.
Executive: Achha, pura deal karte hai. Toh sir actually kya hai ki kam conversion ke basis pe na company refund ka toh matlab nahi deti hai commitment. So aapko koi bolkar gaya hai ki jo refund mil jayega is tarah se?
Customer: Refund nahi milega kya uska?
Executive: Nahi, wohi main jaana chah raha hu actually company ka kya hai ki hum logo ka hum maturity ke basis pe na refund possible nahi hota humari taraf se, right? Aur jo aapne request kiya hai toh obviously main apne senior se discussion karke isko update de paunga aapko. But main jaana chah raha hu ki sir matlab aapka sales wale se kya discussion hua tha? Kyunki hum logo ka dekhiye global marketing platform hai, right? Marketing platform. Yaha par koi customer agar aapka product search kar raha hai toh hum aap logo ki visibility uske samne represent kar pa rahe hai, right sir? Aur main dekh pa raha hu ki recently kuch customers ki inquiries aapke paas directly generate bhi hue the, right? Toh jaise Mujeeb Ali karke APFC panel ka requirement aaya tha, right? Vadodara se ek requirement aaya tha fire fighting panel ka, right? Toh un sab se discussion hua aapka ki nahi hua?
Customer: Nahi sir, woh discuss karne woh yeh woh bol raha hai woh khali dhund raha hu karke yeh aur woh dusra product bolta hai. Idhar likha hai ka likha hai aur dusra product ka baat karta hai mere paas.
Executive: Dusra product ka baat karta hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh actually kyuki mere paas abhi inka request bhi aaya tha aur aapke shayad unhone mail bhi mujhe forward kiya hai, right? But mere ko aapse aapke liye na permission lena padega is baar. Main ek baar discussion kar leta hu kyuki jaise hi main aapki request dalunga further download ke liye, right? Toh mere paas actually kya hai ki update aayega sales team se toh woh sales team na discussion.
Customer: Sir, woh weekly mein woh Priyanka madam bola tha woh ek premium leader main deta hu, saat premium lead deta hu karke bola tha yeh ek bhi premium lead nahi aaya abhi tak.
Executive: Achha, toh unhone aisa kuch aapko bola tha ki premium lead denge?
Customer: Haan, bola tha. Woh offer leke hi aap mere paas paisa woh payment kiya tha.
Executive: Achha, achha, achha.
Customer: Haan. 37760 ka aapka payment aaya tha, right? Aur aapne jo complaint dala hai woh yeh hai to the IndiaMART support team we are writing to express our serious concern and dissatisfaction with the following membership. To we simply subscribe we have subscribed with.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: We are assured that membership would provide us qualified weekly balance for the interested clients. However the experience has not met the primary. Yeah, I still am refund if you are able to provide the renewable leaders problem we request for immediate cancellation of our membership and full refund.
Customer: Haan sir. Toh actually jaise aapne isme mention kiya sir full refund toh possible nahi hai. Jitne din ki services aap logo ki chal chuki hogi, right? Uske basis pe paisa deduct hoke jo remaining amount hoga wohi aapka refund hoga agar refund ka approval mil jata hai.
Customer: Wohi sir, kitna hoga woh refund mere ko?
Executive: Sir, aapne 9 tarikh ko dekho aapka service start hua hai. Abhi matlab almost maan ke chaliyega one month bhi nahi hua hai, right? 20-25 days hue hai. Toh one month ka paisa jo bhi deduct hoga woh hoga baki aapka refund ho jayega. Toh main pehle approval lene ka try kar leta hu jaise hi mujhe approval milta hai we will get the.
Customer: Theek hai, mujhe woh kitna cut karna hai cut karke mujhe 25 din ka woh balance mujhe refund kar dijiye sir.
Executive: Theek hai, main update dal de raha hu is baar, theek hai aur try aapko aapko contact.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thank you so much.
Customer: Okay, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is requesting a refund.

- Not getting relevant buyleads.

- Promised premium leads not received.



Resolution:

- Explained refund policy based on service usage.

- Executive will try to get refund approval.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update after discussing with seniors.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, premium leads, subscription
